reporter_caption.center: IN RE PERSONS TRANSFERRED TO INACTIVE STATUS, 28 INC (Pa. 4-3-2009)

caption.center: IN RE: PERSONS TRANSFERRED TO INACTIVE STATUS PURSUANT TO RULE 111(b),

opinion.opinion_text:
AND NOW, this 3rd day of April, 2009, it is hereby ORDERED that the attorneys named on the attached list are to be transferred to inactive status pursuant to Rule 111(b), Pa.R.C.L.E.; and it is further ORDERED that the said transfer to inactive status shall be effective thirty (30) days after the date of this Order pursuant to Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.
CLICK TO VIEW INACTIVE STATUS LIST
